<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107472</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107472</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212404</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Talk Origins Archive: Exploring the Evolution/Creation Controversy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gespräch Ursprung Archiv: Erforschen der 
Evolution/Creation Kontroverse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Archives d'Origines d'Entretien : Explorer 
la polémique d'Evolution/Creation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arquivo Das Origens Da Conversa: Explorando 
a controvérsia de Evolution/Creation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Archivio Di Origini Di Colloquio: 
Esplorazione della polemica di Evolution/Creation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχείο προέλευσης συζήτησης: Να ερευνήσει τη 
διαμάχη εξέλιξης/δημιουργιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Archivo De los Orígenes De la Charla: 
Explorar la controversia de Evolution/Creation</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This portal website archives essays from a forum for people to discuss evolution (the Modern Synthesis), Deep Time and Creationism.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Portalweb site archiviert Versuche von einem
Forum, damit Leute Entwicklung (die moderne Synthese), tiefe Zeit und 
Kreationismus behandeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site Web de portail archive des essais d'un 
forum pour que les personnes discutent l'évolution (la synthèse 
moderne), le temps et le créationisme profonds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este Web site do portal archives essays de um 
forum para que os povos discutam a evolução (a síntese moderna), o 
tempo e o creationism profundos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo Web site del portal archivia i saggi da una
tribuna affinchè la gente discuta lo sviluppo (sintesi moderna), il 
tempo ed il creationism profondi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο πύλη ιστοχώρος αρχειοθετεί τα δοκίμια από 
ένα φόρουμ για τους ανθρώπους για να συζητήσει την εξέλιξη (η 
σύγχρονη σύνθεση), το βαθιούς χρόνο και Creationism.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este Web site del portal archiva ensayos de un 
foro para que la gente discuta la evolución (la síntesis moderna), 
el tiempo y el creationism profundos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212404</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107472</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/talk-origins-archive-exploring-the-evolution-creation-controversy</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
